Bonesman1990: Why does both christianity and Islam keep on calling an alleged allmighty being (of who we have no proof whatsoever) as an MALE. Like "his will be done"???

Both christianity and Islam says that HE have no equal although they debate if HE is one or three.

Sex is a purely an term for an animal, like human beings among millions of other species. There cannot be an HIM without an HER!

Why call "God" an him? I believe both christians and muslims are doing strange logic loops in trying to put some sense of logic in this notion!

Religions as the abrahamic faiths truly are an opium for the people!
